titleInfo.title: Christian Brothers College Basketball and Baseball Program, 1968-69

mods.abstract: Christian Brothers College baseball and basketball teams promoted their schedules for 1968-1969 while Bucky the Buccaneer dribbled.
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law.
